text: Matamduda tung-inbasing aduna Ibungogi manakta laktuna mahakpu houdoktuna hairak-i, “Oja Ibungo, oja Ibungo! Eikhoi siba tare!” Maduda Ibungona hougatladuna nungsit amasung ithak ipom aduda lepnanaba yathang pirammi. Adudagi nonglei nungshit adu lepkhirammi amasung pumnamak tumin leikhirammi.
